text: What's the most adventurous thing you've ever done?
If you could travel anywhere in the world right now, where would you go?
What's on your travel bucket list?
Beach vacation or mountain getaway? Why?
What's the most interesting culture you've experienced?
What's a travel mishap that turned into a funny story?
Do you prefer planned itineraries or spontaneous adventures?
What's a local hidden gem you've discovered in your travels or hometown?
What's the most breathtaking natural wonder you've seen?
What's one food you tried while traveling that you'll never forget?
If you could take a road trip with any three people (living or dead), who would they be?
What's your favorite mode of transportation for travel?
What's a travel destination that completely surprised you (in a good or bad way)?
What's one thing you always pack, no matter where you're going?
Would you rather explore ancient ruins or a bustling modern city?
What's a language you'd love to learn for travel purposes?
What's the longest journey you've ever taken?
What's a travel tip you swear by?
What's an adventure activity you'd love to try (e.g., skydiving, scuba diving)?
How has travel changed your perspective on life?
